response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value to you, I estimate it's worth $12,000. My offer to you is $10,500, aiming to ensure both a fair transaction and a beneficial outcome for us. I look forward to your consideration. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 10500}
